Articles.Content:
Right now I'm reading an online story called "Eyes turned skyward". It is an alternate history "book" set between the early 70s and today. The "point of divergence" is Richard Nixon being giving the choice between funding a reusable "space truck" or development of the hardware used on Apollo to build manned LEO infrastructure. In our timeline, he went for the space truck. What if he chose differently?

http://alternatehistory.com/discussion/showthread.php?t=208954

As you might know (you almost defiantly don't), I am a big Apollo Applications Program fanboy, so reading this had been a blast!

Do you know of any alternate history stories you enjoyed, where humanity chose a different path to the heavens?
I like to read 2001: A Space Odyssey as an alternative history story, had NASA's budget stayed at Apollo Program levels throughout the 20th century... with some alien stuff thrown in.

I like to read 2001: A Space Odyssey as an alternative history story, had NASA's budget stayed at Apollo Program levels throughout the 20th century... with some alien stuff thrown in.

It does however, contain aliens.
